Metadata: Information on the wallet size (3.5 x 2 inch) for the Orca whale Rangefinder card: Step one: Hold card at arm's length and close your right eye. Step two: Looking through your left eye, line up the left edge of the card with the whale in the water. Step three: Now close your left eye and look through your right. If the whale appears to the left of the 400 yard mark on the card, move away — you are too close.
